comments:
Suse 8.2 - Motif
Hyades 3.0_20040419_0915

- Open the preferences dialog.
- Open Profiling & logging -> Appearance -> UML2 Sequence diagram -> Log 
interactions.
- Change the page size to any other value.
- Click Apply, then Ok.
